name: Deep of the Water
description:
Your goal is to escape from the Deep of the Water. You are Linked to your Oxygen tank. Collect Fishes to increase your space. Be aware of the Beasts!

Controls
  • W,A,S,D to move
  • SPACE - dash
Credits / About

Created by me  in one week for the GoGodot game jam. 

Art Assets:  Photoshop

Sound effects: sfxr,  main theme

Controls: Joystick
